Package com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

UI services and listener implementations for management of transactions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICancelTransactionListener
    The listener interface for receiving ICancelTransactionService operation callbacks.
    ICancelTransactionService
    The Interface ICancelTransactionService.
    IProcessPaymentListener
    The listener interface for receiving IProcessPaymentService operation callbacks.
    IProcessPaymentService
    The Interface IProcessPaymentService.
    IProcessSplitPaymentListener
    The listener interface for receiving IProcessPaymentService.doSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment) operation callbacks.
    IRefundTransactionListener
    The listener interface for receiving IRefundTransactionService operation callbacks.
    IRefundTransactionService
    The Interface IRefundTransactionService.
    ITransactionHistoryRetrievalListener
    The listener interface for receiving ITransactionHistoryRetrievalService operation callbacks.
    ITransactionHistoryRetrievalService
    The Interface ITransactionDataRetrievalService.
    ITransactionRetrievalListener
    The listener interface for receiving ITransactionRetrievalService operation callbacks.
    ITransactionRetrievalService
    The Interface ITransactionRetrievalService.
    ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener
    Listener interface that can be used to retrieve transaction information with split tender details.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelTransactionListenerAdapter
    This class provides an empty implementation for ICancelTransactionListener.
    CancelTransactionService
    The Class CancelTransactionService.
    ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter
    This class provides an empty implementation for IProcessSplitPaymentListener.
    ProcessPaymentService
    The Class ProcessPaymentService.
    RefundTransactionListenerAdapter
    This class provides an empty implementation for IRefundTransactionListener.
    RefundTransactionService
    The Class RefundTransactionService.
    TransactionHistoryRetrievalListenerAdapter
    This class provides an empty implementation for ITransactionHistoryRetrievalListener.
    TransactionHistoryRetrievalService
    The Class TransactionDataRetrievalService.
    TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter
    This class provides an empty implementation for ITransactionRetrievalListener.
    TransactionRetrievalService
    The Class TransactionRetrievalService.
